attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make ticket touting illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am pesonally sick of battling against ticket touts to buy tix to see my favourite bands, just check ebay 20 mins after a gig sells out in record time. We work hard for our money and pay massively inflated tax bills (thanks Gordon), why should we be forced to buy tickets at inflated prices from someone who wont pay tax on their little side line? Keep live music for the true fans.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
